author: felicity
msg: bug 3427: if a schemeless URI was found, we would add 'http://' to the front, which is very bad since it would do this for 'foo.gif', '#foo', etc.  Also, modify uri.t to give debug output upon failure.

author: felicity
msg: bug 3427: if a schemeless URI was found, we would add 'http://' to the front, which is very bad since it would do this for 'foo.gif', '#foo', etc.  Also, modify uri.t to give debug output upon failure.
